title: Make lethality more effective on assassins
body: Why not give assassins ONLY spell damage buffs from lethality. If it was a stat that other classes couldn't use (like mana on an energy based champion) it would probably be easier to balance. Eh?

replies.body: y not keep the lethality items a bit weaker and give assassins inate pen stats, that way marksmen cant abuse the flat pen items like before
